item.title: 经济数据推高利率，比特币跌破 10 万美元
item.description: 比特币重返 100,000 美元上方的步伐并没有持续太久。周二，由于新的经济数据导致国债收益率飙升，比特币创下两周多来的最大跌幅，与美国股市一起回落。【原文：Bitcoin’s march back above $100,000 didn’t last long. The token slid the most in more than two weeks on Tuesday, joining a retreat in US stocks, as fresh economic data sent Treasury yields soaring.】

item.title: 即将上任的首席执行官称，道明将在审查中考虑施瓦布股份的命运
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）新任首席执行官雷蒙德-秦（Raymond Chun）表示，作为该加拿大银行美国洗钱丑闻引发的战略审查的一部分，多伦多道明银行将考虑其在嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp.【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank will consider the fate of its 10.1% stake in Charles Schwab Corp. as part of a strategic review stemming from the Canadian bank’s US money-laundering scandal, incoming Chief Executive Officer Raymond Chun said.】

item.title: 对大科技的热爱与恐惧助推 Invesco ETF 基金创下历史新高
item.description: Invesco Ltd.的ETF产品线在2024年从至少两类投资者那里吸收了创纪录的现金：一类是追逐人工智能收益的投资者，另一类是回避大科技影响的投资者。【原文：Invesco Ltd.’s ETF lineup absorbed a record amount of cash in 2024 from at least two classes of investors: those chasing AI-driven gains, and those shying away from big tech’s sway.】

item.title: 约翰-赫斯 "非常有信心 "打赢埃克森和雪佛龙合并案

item.title: 干旱来袭，拉尼娜效应令阿根廷农民大吃一惊
item.description: 两年前，拉尼娜气候模式曾给阿根廷的农场造成严重破坏，预计这次会好一些。但随着生长季节的到来，长期干旱的天气又开始出现。【原文：A La Niña weather pattern that wreaked havoc on Argentina’s farms just two years ago was expected to be kinder this time around. But as the growing season gets under way, a long bout of dry weather is emerging again.】
